roleset.name: new, vital, unadulterated

example.name: the arg
example.text: I like Haye because he 's fresh and quite exciting .

example.name: the arg
example.text: The air was fresh and she felt revived.

roleset.name: impertinent

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: She-1 was being reprimanded for [*-1] being fresh to him while he sat here and lied to her face.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: I wasn't upset, I knew she wasn't being fresh about it, just trying to demonstrate some independence.
